original_text: And Joseph said unto his brethren, I am Joseph; doth my father yet live? And his brethren could not answer him; for they were troubled at his presence.
korean_text: 요셉이 그 형들에게 이르되 나는 요셉이라 내 아버지께서 아직 살아 계시니이까 형들이 그 앞에서 놀라서 대답하지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: And Joseph said unto his brethren
And his brethren could not answer him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 형제들이 그에게 대답할 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: for they were troubled at his presence
